title: Fragment, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered
description: Linen fragment embroidered in silk in shades of blue, rose and white in a pattern of a delicate curving vine. Incomplete as indicated by the vine stem which is not worked. Piece is backed with a coarser linen and the flowers are worked through this lining.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, early 19th century.Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered. 1966-62-1.
